properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Warning issued January 17 at 4:00PM EST until January 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning. Ice may rapidly
accumulate on vessels. For the Gale Warning, west wgales to
around 40 knots and waves 9 to 14 feet expected.

* WHERE...St Joseph to South Haven MI, South Haven to Holland
MI, Holland to Grand Haven MI, Grand Haven to Whitehall MI,
Whitehall to Pentwater MI and Pentwater to Manistee MI.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 4 PM
Saturday to 1 PM EST Sunday. For the Gale Warning, from 1 AM
Saturday to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of
stability. Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and waves will peak Saturday evening.
Heavy freezing spray is expeced from Saturday evening into
Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
